subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New SpeakJet File.
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
LOL, very funny! Although I heard "I am selorry" - but like every
little robot, it has yet to learn the correct pronunciation... :)

-- 

> I was having trouble hearing what the box said and asked it to repeat
> what it just said, the box then said it was "sorry".....
> Strange but true!
> Rob
> Deadscience.com
